title: ID 6399 Orange Sequin Flower Patch Hibiscus Plant Embroidered Iron On Applique
features: THE SIZE OF THE PATCH IS APPROXIMATELY 2 1/2" WIDE and 2" TALL. We measure from the longest points on each side.
We use top of the line embroidery to get the most realistic and vibrant colors. This also allows us to get sharper images to make our patches stand out.

We use high quality heat seal backing on all our iron on patches. This allows for a strong bond that holds the test of time. All of our patches can also be sewn on to hold up better to repeated washes. Please see our full iron on guide located below.
Our patches help you customize all of your items. They work perfect on Backpacks, Jackets, Bags, or anything else you want to make unique to you!
